title: PES Merit List not accounced?
content:
https://preview.redd.it/vkokogu7xvle1.png?width=1305&format=png&auto=webp&s=f61ceed66ca8e55b32cdd5ca4fc2093c00e90d36

Wasn't the Merit List supposed to come today?  
I applied via the JEE Mains Session 1 thing. I got 99.6xx, will that get me CSE in RR?

comments.body: with that percentile if you applied to pes maybe natural selection is in play
My parents forced me to lol. It's not my choice at all, but they've been bugging me to check this
pretty sure you get cse in RR but im waiting for the merit list too its said tentative so might not release today
How much did you get in mains? Is PES your first preference?
Are you a PES student?
Called up PES they said they are having some issues and would post it by the end of today or tmr. So most prolly its gonna come out tmr.
Hopefully it's today. My mom won't stop asking me to refresh the page lol
Iâ€™ve gotten a 96.5 and Iâ€™m still not sure about it being my first preference right now
I saw 99.6 and I was like wit this competition where tf do i get a seat
imo its gonna come out tmrw, Idts anyone will still be working, day is almost over
Ah probably, Thank you!
Have you applied for KCET? Cause you might CSE RR thru kcet (fees is 1 lakh) instead of paying 5 lakhs thru JEE Mains
I have applied for both, but KCET is yet to happen
Oh nice...
Are you a PES student? Can I DM you?
yes
im pretty sure you can get into a good nit with that percentile. pes is not worth paying 4.5 lakh for, so keep it as your last option.

Yes yes! I'm still trying to improve my score in JEE Mains Session 2, and then BITS and Advanced etc. We'll see, but according to my parents "PES is a safe option" hence the application. Thank you though! Much Appreciated
Yeah I mean if u got 98-97 would make sense to apply to pes as a back up but at 99.6 ur bound to get good seats in nits and iiits.
He can get IIIT bangalore cse with that i think
np. all the best.
that hurts to hear, where did she end up going?
PES e city lmao. she got a good enough kcet rank for RR but her parents did let her go there either.

my brother in christ dont do this to yourself. you'll hate yourself.  
with that kinda percentile go to some iiit or any decent nit that u get.  
and if u really really want to, come in thru cet, i can assure you u'll easily get in. the 5ish lakh fee thru mains with that kinda score is REALLY not worth it
iiitb is in ecity as well... or did they not want her to go to an hostel?
they didn't want her to "mingle with boys" and IIITB would have more guys obv
it genuinely pains me to hear this, I hope shes doing okay now

Hey dude,

did you email them regarding prefrences?What did they say?

wait what

my parents are sorta like that, and I told them I got cse at pes ecity ðŸ¥¹
